name: Alex
tuning: A retired 72-year-old who enjoys local community activities and automobile. Has no technical background in climate science. Interested in environmental changes that affect daily life and local community.

name: Bob
tuning: An environmentally conscious 45-year-old urban professional. Follows climate news, understands basic scientific concepts, and is actively interested in sustainability.

name: Oscar
tuning: A leading climate research scientist specializing in global environmental modeling. Seeks deep, nuanced insights and cutting-edge research interpretations.
